thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Julian

author: Julian
title: Julian
text:
We have been working with Nikolas for several years and he has done an outstanding job managing our property. Nik is very pro-active and has great attention to detail in all of our dealings to date. He is also very prompt with his responses to queries relating to tenancy, leasing, advertising of our property, vetting potential tenants, maintenance issues. Nik has a very good understanding of the rental environment and its seasonal variations, and has always provided balanced advice when seeking the best solution for our property. In addition to his professional service, Nik is also personable and always willing to help.
I have no hesitation in recommending Nik to manage your property.
